name: Brain Challenge
overview: Boost your brain and relieve stress through funny and smart mini-games. Choose your favorite coach and get detailed evaluations of your performances in personal training sessions. Compare yourself with friends and family in delirious multiplayer modes... and see who is the best! Features: -25 mini-games testing and training your Visual, Memory, Logic, Math, and Focus abilities -3 multiplayer modes: Card Game, Snatch Game, and Time Attack -A Stress mode offering 5 challenging mini-games to develop your resistance to real-life situations -3 Creativity activities to relax your mind -Choose your favorite of 2 personal coaches -The special Kid Test makes this game accessible even to a very young audience
